sentences.en: Cost is obviously important.
sentences.cn: 费用当然很重要。

sentences.en: He grimaced slightly, obviously expecting no answer to his rhetorical question.
sentences.cn: 他微微皱了下眉头，显然并不期待任何人回答他的反问。

sentences.en: He wants actors who can speak Welsh. Obviously I've had it.
sentences.cn: 他要的是会说威尔士语的演员。明摆着，我是没指望了。

sentences.en: He was sidling into the bar, obviously trying to be inconspicuous.
sentences.cn: 他悄悄地走进酒吧，显然不想引起注意。

sentences.en: He'd obviously kept himself fit despite his years of confinement.
sentences.cn: 显然，尽管监禁多年，他依旧保持着身体健康。

sentences.en: His mother was old, badly dressed and obviously downtrodden.
sentences.cn: 他母亲老了，衣着破旧，显然尝尽了苦难。

sentences.en: I thought he was very attractive and obviously very intelligent.
sentences.cn: 我觉得他魅力非凡，才智过人。

sentences.en: Now, erm, obviously some of our listeners may have some ideas.
sentences.cn: 嗯，对了，显然我们的一些听众可能会有些想法。

sentences.en: Obviously the puncture threw me a little, but I'm reasonably happy.
sentences.cn: 显然，轮胎扎破让我感到有些意外，不过我还是挺开心的。

sentences.en: Obviously, this is going to take some time.
sentences.cn: 很明显，这要花点时间。

sentences.en: Of course, there'squite obviously a lot of synergy between the two companies.
sentences.cn: 当然，这两家公司间非常明显地产生了巨大的协同效应。

sentences.en: Scott was obviously inebriated by the time the dessert was served.
sentences.cn: 到了上甜点的时候，斯科特显然已经喝醉了。

sentences.en: She frowned and was obviously puzzled.
sentences.cn: 她皱起眉头，显然感到不解。

sentences.en: She was very glum and was obviously missing her children.
sentences.cn: 她郁郁寡欢，显然在惦念自己的孩子们。

sentences.en: The poor guy obviously didn't have any place to go for Easter.
sentences.cn: 这个可怜的家伙显然复活节无处可去。

sentences.en: The railway had obviously been built long after the house.
sentences.cn: 显然，这条铁路是房子建成后很久才造的。

sentences.en: The reason for my visit had obviously slipped his mind.
sentences.cn: 他显然已经忘掉了我的来意。

sentences.en: This obviously works against the interests of the child.
sentences.cn: 这显然会对孩子不利。

sentences.en: We’re obviously going to need more help.
sentences.cn: 显然我们将需要更多的帮助。

sentences.en: Your research has obviously been very thorough.
sentences.cn: 你的研究工作显然做得很透彻。

words.tran_cn: 明显的；显著的；平淡无奇的

trans.tran_en: used to mean that a fact can easily be noticed or understood
